page.title: 05Homelife,Abermorddu & Area
page.content: {A Day in the life of Alasdair Forman Most mornings I wake up about 6:45am. I read till about 7:15am then I get dressed and play darts,pool or practise my guitar till about 7:50am. Then I go downstairs and get my things ready for school.At about 8am I have my breakfast,then I go upstairs and clean my teeth.Then I play darts or pool till about 8:30-8:35am, when I go to school.I get to school about 8:40am and play football until school starts at 9am. I return home from school at about 3:30pm. After changing, I watch T.V. if there is anything interesting on. Sometimes I play soccer,or ride my bicycle. About 5:30pm I come in for a meal. In the evening I play darts,pool or watch T.V. I go to bed at 10:00pm.
